title: i am really mad right now cuz i got leaver booster cuz bugsplats
body: oh man... got 5 game lower queue priority because i got 5 bugsplats, i played a game with anivia then i went to play support in ranked, picked thresh, the game started but i got a bugsplat after another then they finally remaked, and now i have to wait 20 min for 5 games really (there might be a thresh bug idk) {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
This is far less likely a bug with Thresh and more an issue with your hardware or system drivers. Bugsplats can be pretty tricky, but most of the time can be resolved with the steps outlined in our [Bugsplat & Crashing guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)

Let me know if those steps helped resolve the issue.

yes, bugsplats are tricky, because i played a custom game to check if i have a bugsplat and everything was fine and i didint change anything, im gonna cry i dont have time to wait 20 mins but oh well i diserve that
